# Tomato PHP

üçÖ Tomato PHP is a Full CRUD Generator for [Splade](https://splade.dev/) & [Breeze Starter Kit](https://splade.dev/docs/breeze)

## Installation

```bash
composer require tomatophp/tomato-php
```

## Support

you can join our discord server to get support [TomatoPHP](https://discord.gg/Xqmt35Uh)

## Docs

you can check docs of this package on [Docs](https://docs.tomatophp.com/tomato-php)
